name: Idioctopus
description: Play Idioctopus and guide brainless lovestruck octopus couples safely to their romantic rendezvous in increasingly deadly date spots.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 64 bit Processor: Intel (R) Pentium (R) CPU 2117U @ 1.80GHz 1.80 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio Additional Notes: This is the minimum we have tested it on.
